de.unihalle.sqlequalizer
Class Login

java.lang.Object
  de.unihalle.sqlequalizer.Login

public class Login
extends java.lang.Object

Class handles login for sql-equalizer. Login data are saved in internal database. default is: login: admin password: secure1234

Author:
Robert Hartmann
